mdRecord.dcterms:title: Altes Museum, exterior|detail view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Schinkel, Karl Friedrich (German architect, painter, and printmaker, 1781-1841) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Originally built to house all of Berlin's art collections, the Altes Museum has accommodated the Collection of Classical Antiquities since 1904. Between 1943 and 1945 the building was severely damaged by fire. Reconstruction work continued up until 1966. - http://www.smb.museum/smb/standorte/index.php?lang=en&p=2&objID=24&n=2 [work]
